phrases: Send the lost promises to the stars
My memories will not fade away
yotsuba no clover sagashinagara kimi no kao
I steal a glance at you as we look for four-leaf clovers,
chirari nusumi mite wa me o sorasu
yasashii ame wa furu watashitachi no ue ni
The gentle rain falls above our heads
surechigau hito no kazu dake dramatic ni naru no
as it becomes as dramatic as the number of people passing by
I wonder if we will ever be able to
itsuka mata aeru hi ga kurukashira
reunite with those precious things that were broken
The scars that were left behind will not go away
I am here, but it does not feel like it.
Things I need to do... as soon as possible...
There should have been a lot of them.
Do I feel foggy because of the allergies I started having this year?
My sight grows fuzzy from the tearing eyes and running nose.
When I come to, I am always thinking about the past.
Because the cherry blossom petals are constantly falling in front of me...
I wonder if Professor Tange is okay...
How heart-breaking... all because he became affiliated with Morita.
Is he repeating the year again?
I am finally going to be in the same year as Morita-san.
And we will finally see the birth of a legendary eighth grader.
And where is the very person who made Professor like that?!
Why is not he pouring Professor some sake
Zundoko-bushi: a popular Japanese song based on a WWII naval ballad and remade several times over the years.
The final train comes in like it does every night.
It shakes the red lanterns downstairs as it passes by.
He is singing naturally and blending into some strangers' group.
On top of that, it looks like everyone was waiting for him.
He already has speakers and spotlights set up, and even made his own flyers.
Even though he could not finish his graduate thesis on time!
Man, he is doing it again this year?
This is the fifth time I have seen his Gian recital.
He cannot sing at all but makes everyone listen to his singing.
Mayama, what about your company's cherry blossom viewing?
I heard you were appointed the chair.
It was yesterday, but it turned into a mahjong tournament due to the rain.
It really caught me by surprise.
I was staking out a spot when it started pouring all of a sudden.
Let us switch things over to a mahjong tournament, then.
I will make a reservation at Tachikawa.
I guess I will get going then.
There is a flower petal in your cup.
So you drink it along with the petal.
Well, I need to get going.
There is a toast with everyone from the shopping district soon, so I need to be there.
Here is the further prosperity of the Hamadayama shopping district!
What is with his fancy glasses?
She has absolutely no taste in good men!
What is so good about that four-eyes?
Actually, that man has no taste in good women, either!
Even though our beloved Ayu-sama thinks about him so much...
Why, you spendthrift who does not even fear God...!
Now, everyone, hold on a second.
What are you trying to say?
Her cute face as she is sleeping.
It has not changed a bit since she was in elementary school.
No matter how she is hurting herself over an unrequited love...
The spirit of that four-eyes for not just gobbling her up, even after having this cuteness in front of him for four years...
As to be expected from the chair of the Third Generation Association!
A big pile of fan letters...
I just do not understand society anymore.
What will become of Japan if a man like this is praised?
By the way, where is Mouse No. 1?
And I was going to let her join the Chibi-Hamus.
Chibi-Hamus (Little Hamsters): a reference to Mini Moni, a subgroup of Morning Musume consisting of the youngest members.
Morita-san, did you by chance dote on a dog or cat and because it to become neurotic when you were little?
What the heck, all of you?!
I will not let you see her when she is wearing this outfit!
Hagu, I am kind of hungry.
Do you mind if I start eating?
I thought it had beefsteak plant, but it is actually mint!
Hagu-chan has not been lively lately.
Ever since around the time she went out with Morita-san.
I do not know what happened between the two of them.
But she stopped putting that broach with the little bird on her chest.
I wonder if Morita-san has noticed...
Well, I asked her to buy me a boxed meal...
I will go take a look.
It is been a while, has not it?
You do not seem to be well.
It is kind of cold today, is not it?
But... why do I feel relieved when they all scatter?
Is it because I am released from that melancholy feeling of lamenting their scattering?
Man, you seem to be pretty popular.
They are all flyers for attracting new freshmen.
Hey, you, want to join the Tennis Club?
You know, I am already a fourth-year.
It is been a week already.
And her fever is still at 37.4C.
So it is not going down?
Well, this really is not anything new.
The day before a school trip...
Well, I guess it is something like a wisdom fever.
But it sure is taking a while this time.
Well, she will not tell me anything.
Lately, the pace of her work has been slowing down, too.
Before, I could not keep up no matter how many new canvases I got for her.
Hagu-chan seems to have been feeling down lately.
Yeah, and I have no idea what happened.
There is nothing I can do for her if I do not know the reason.
My little princess's face makes it seem like she is going to sleep for a hundred years.
That sounds like the Sleeping Beauty.
Then she is not going to wake up unless she gets that... you know, a prince's...
The kanji is actually for the fish Kisu .
Sensei... I know, so please... put away that bat with nails.
Moreover, your diagram is in a loop.
Remember when Hagu went shopping with Morita?
She came back that day and dejectedly told me this...
She could not tell him that she wanted to go to the restroom.
She could not even eat in front of him.
That is why she did not like it.
It is because she likes him, of course.
I was simply happy that she could be herself in front of me.
The way she happily ate her flan in front of me was adorable.
Being so nervous that even swallowing becomes difficult when you are with that person...
I must have been in love all by myself.
Well, depends on how you look at it.
So instead of coming home in the morning after an all-nighter at work, you came back in the evening?
Well, you see, I am sleepy but hungry.
But maybe I should just go to sleep.
Though I have not eaten anything since last night.
His judgment ability is noticeably impaired.
I will go boil some water.
Morita-san's room the one that nobody could see the inside of?!
The one that has been called the black hole of this apartment?!
He is bypassing the SASF security at an amazing speed!
Even Morita-san himself rarely gets access on his first try!
I cannot get into my room.
I am in a hurry here!
I am going to break you, stupid machine!
In that case, Kaoru-san, please recite your three favorite tongue twisters
Whoa, he is forcing his way in!
Get it to Narita in 50 minutes at all costs!
Do not take your eyes off that idiot.
I cannot have him getting lost on top of what is already happened.
Yamamoto just left on a motorcycle with the passport.
I will also head your way.
Getting into someone is car just like that...
I-I promised to see him off.
You got it to him on time?
I am stuck at the entrance due to an inspection.
What the hell are you thinking?
Why are you always being so selfish?
He has everything I want in the palm of his hand...
You will lose all of them like this!
I was in a hurry, so...
H-How am I going to get back?
Are you done seeing him off?
Okay then, shall we go back?
You are riding with me, right?
It feels like I have seen him somewhere before.
Rather, he looks just like him when I take a closer look!
E-Excuse me, are you perhaps Morita-san's older brother?
You look a lot like him.
Please do not compare me to that wild, money-hungry man!
No, I am his older brother.
But if you took away his ability to make money, he would just be a paleolithic caveman!
We are short on time, so I will speed up.
Please watch out... for your neck.
Despite everything, he drove me to my apartment.
I just got in without your permission and even had you drive me home.
But I only have... I... I...
Well then, thank you very much for today.
Please keep taking good care of Shinobu.
In his address book, Shinobu wrote Mayama the intellectual and Takemoto the Shiba dog.
Well, I cannot tell you exactly when.
But considering the amount of work he accepted, he should not be able to come back so easily.
Do you want him to come back?
I rub my heavy eyelids to reveal
A future in the shape of pastels
As my expressions were pulled in closer
Say, what was it that we were looking for again?
That is right, exactly when were those days
bokura ga inryoku ni sakarai nagara deatta koro
When we used to meet, denying the attraction that was forming between us?
sore ga waltz no you dane fushigi sa
It is like a waltz, is not it?
sasayaku youna komorebi no kousaten de
futari waltz no youni ne mawari nagara
Where the whispering sunlight falls through the trees and meet.
Next episode: Wanting to hear just that one word.
